short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and filter through bookmarked webpages with the use hotkeys and hashtags!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slinky allows you to rapidly save and search through bookmarks with the use of hotkeys. When you have found a page you want to bookmark open the extension and start hashtagging away!
